title: Setting user online
description: This event ("set-user") has to be emitted when a user comes online.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitSetUser

title: Verification the init user
description: This event ("verify-user") has to be listened on the user's end to verify user
name: ListenVerifyuser

title: Create New Task
description: This event ("createRequest") has to be emitted when a user create the task

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted
examples.content:
{
                            Id: string,
                            sender_id: string,
                            receiver_id: string,
                            message: string,
                            category: string
                        }

name: EmitCreaterequest

                            receiver_id: string,
